title: Beyond A Reasonable Doubt - August 31, 2021
itunes:title: Beyond A Reasonable Doubt - August 31, 2021
description:
Adam and Mark re-connect and Mark opens the show with a vexing ruling in a case we've covered before on Reasonable Doubt and Adam asks Mark for his take on some of what was said by Capitol Police Lieutenant Michael Byrd in his interview with NBC's Lester Holt.

Watch Beyond A Reasonable Doubt on YouTube at YouTube.com/ReasonableDoubtPodcast and subscribe while you're there.
